title: Ticket #5258: fix  job_cp_cclim_acctgrp_basic_van.run to work with classad caching
description:
The test job_cp_cclim_acctgrp_basic_van.run current disables classad caching claiming that there is an interaction between that and the quantize function.

We should test to see if that is still true. and if it is we should fix it.
creator: johnkn
